cards.name: Air Wisp
cards.ability: Wind Walker: Air Wisp can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
cards.lore: Air Wisps are elusive spirits that slip past powerful foes and create chaos on the battlefield.

cards.name: Fire Wisp
cards.ability: Spark Multiplication: Whenever this creature deals damage, create a 1/1 Fire Wisp token.
cards.lore: Fire Wisps multiply rapidly but burn out quickly, like sparks from a bonfire.

cards.name: Earth Wisp
cards.ability: Geomancy: Tap an untapped land you control: Earth Wisp gets +1/+1 until end of turn. You may only activate this ability once per turn.
cards.lore: Earth Wisps draw power directly from the land, growing stronger with each connection to the earth.

cards.name: Nature Wisp
cards.ability: Seasonal Shift: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose summer (+2/+0), autumn (deathtouch), winter (tap target creature), or spring (+0/+2 and gain 2 life). Nature Wisp gains the chosen ability until your next turn.
cards.lore: Nature Wisps embody the changing seasons, their powers waxing and waning with nature's cycles.

cards.name: Water Wisp
cards.ability: Tidal Surge: Whenever Water Wisp attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.lore: Water Wisps crash against their foes like waves upon the shore, retreating only to surge again.

cards.name: Light Wisp
cards.ability: Illuminating Presence: Creatures you control have "{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn."
cards.lore: Light Wisps suffuse their allies with a protective radiance, shielding them from harm.

cards.name: Dark Wisp
cards.ability: Shadow Puppetry: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than Dark Wisp's power until end of turn. It gains haste.
cards.lore: Dark Wisps manipulate the shadows within other creatures, briefly bending them to their will.

cards.name: Lightning Wisp
cards.ability: Chain Reaction: Whenever Lightning Wisp deals damage to a creature, it deals 1 damage to that creature's controller and each creature they control.
cards.lore: Lightning Wisps embody the chaotic nature of storms, their attacks arcing unpredictably across the battlefield.

cards.name: Swamp Wisp
cards.ability: Fetid Bloom: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a decay counter on each creature. Creatures with decay counters get -1/-1 for each decay counter on them.
cards.lore: Swamp Wisps spread a creeping rot that slowly consumes all life around them.

cards.name: Ice Wisp
cards.ability: When enters: Exile target creature with ice counters equal to its power. Remove one counter each upkeep. Return it when no counters remain.
cards.lore: Ice Wisps can encase creatures in magical ice, preserving them for later use or neutralizing threats.

cards.name: Crystal Wisp
cards.ability: Refractive Duplication: When Crystal Wisp enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Wisp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, Crystal Wisp gains that Wisp's abilities until end of turn.
cards.lore: Crystal Wisps refract magical essences, briefly taking on the properties of other elemental beings.

cards.name: Void Wisp
cards.ability: Creates 2x2 Null Zone on entry. Creatures on/near can't attack, block, or activate abilities. Move Zone 2 spaces each upkeep. Removed when Void Wisp leaves.
cards.lore: Void Wisps exist between realities, capable of briefly warping the fabric of existence to create impossible effects.
